title: Bonus: #SurvivingSociety feat Jade, Michelle Hope, Jamilah Lemieux
itunes:title: Bonus: #SurvivingSociety feat Jade, Michelle Hope, Jamilah Lemieux
description:
On this bonus episode Mandii is joined at the round table with other strong, black and opinionated women to discuss the Lifetime docu-series Surviving Rkelly and the larger scope of the issues that were brought to light. We discuss sexual abuse as it pertains to both girls and boys, the responsibility put on children and teenagers to respond to predators, holding adults accountable, turning a blind eye when things aren't right and more! Michelle Hope is a sexpert that focuses on sex and child development and the importance of sex education starting from an early age and in the household. Jade is the host of podcasts Gettin' Grown and Jade&XD while also a wife and mother. Jamilah Lemieux, while having had appeared on Surviving Rkelly, is a critic, black feminist, and voice for the #MeToo movement. It was important that we brought this dialogue to our platform and started the conversation. Please feel free to discuss this on social media using the hashtag #SurvivingSociety Follow the ladies on this episode on their social media: Jade @jadeofalljades IG/Twitter Michelle Hope @MHsexpert IG/Twitter Jamilah Lemieux @JamilahLemieux IG/Twitter Mandii @Fullcourtpumps IG/Twitter

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
